report.title: Number of plots per species by plot type
report.description: Return a list of species with the number of plots each species appears in. The report is grouped by survey type.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM surveys s JOIN websites w on w.id=s.website_id AND w.deleted=false JOIN cache_occurrences co on co.survey_id=s.id AND co.cache_created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) JOIN locations plot on plot.id=co.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=co.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa t ON t.id=ttl.taxon_id AND t.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.website_id in (#sharing_website_ids#) #filters# AND s.deleted=false GROUP BY s.id, t.id

param.name: ignore_dates_before
param.description: Ignore data created before this data.
